additionalType.name: additionalType
additionalType.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

description.name: description
description.description: A short description of the item.

image.name: image
image.description: URL of an image of the item.

sameAs.name: sameAs
sameAs.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.

aggregateRating.name: aggregateRating
aggregateRating.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

containedIn.name: containedIn
containedIn.description: The basic containment relation between places.

event.name: event
event.description: Upcoming or past event associated with this place or organization.

events.name: events
events.description: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization (legacy spelling; see singular form, event).

geo.name: geo
geo.description: The geo coordinates of the place.

globalLocationNumber.name: globalLocationNumber
globalLocationNumber.description: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

interactionCount.name: interactionCount
interactionCount.description: A count of a specific user interactions with this itemâ€”for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.

isicV4.name: isicV4
isicV4.description: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

logo.name: logo
logo.description: URL of an image for the logo of the item.

map.name: map
map.description: A URL to a map of the place.

maps.name: maps
maps.description: A URL to a map of the place (legacy spelling; see singular form, map).

openingHoursSpecification.name: openingHoursSpecification
openingHoursSpecification.description: The opening hours of a certain place.

photos.name: photos
photos.description: Photographs of this place (legacy spelling; see singular form, photo).

reviews.name: reviews
reviews.description: Review of the item (legacy spelling; see singular form, review).

brand.name: brand
brand.description: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

contactPoint.name: contactPoint
contactPoint.description: A contact point for a person or organization.

contactPoints.name: contactPoints
contactPoints.description: A contact point for a person or organization (legacy spelling; see singular form, contactPoint).

duns.name: duns
duns.description: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

employees.name: employees
employees.description: People working for this organization. (legacy spelling; see singular form, employee)

founder.name: founder
founder.description: A person who founded this organization.

founders.name: founders
founders.description: A person who founded this organization (legacy spelling; see singular form, founder).

foundingDate.name: foundingDate
foundingDate.description: The date that this organization was founded.

hasPOS.name: hasPOS
hasPOS.description: Points-of-Sales operated by the organization or person.

legalName.name: legalName
legalName.description: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.

location.name: location
location.description: The location of the event, organization or action.

makesOffer.name: makesOffer
makesOffer.description: A pointer to products or services offered by the organization or person.

members.name: members
members.description: A member of this organization (legacy spelling; see singular form, member).

naics.name: naics
naics.description: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or business person.

owns.name: owns
owns.description: Products owned by the organization or person.

seeks.name: seeks
seeks.description: A pointer to products or services sought by the organization or person (demand).

taxID.name: taxID
taxID.description: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the organization or person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.

vatID.name: vatID
vatID.description: The Value-added Tax ID of the organisation or person.

branchOf.name: branchOf
branchOf.description: The larger organization that this local business is a branch of, if any.

currenciesAccepted.name: currenciesAccepted
currenciesAccepted.description: The currency accepted (in ISO 4217 currency format).

openingHours.name: openingHours
openingHours.description: The opening hours for a business. Opening hours can be specified as a weekly time range, starting with days, then times per day. Multiple days can be listed with commas ',' separating each day. Day or time ranges are specified using a hyphen '-'.- Days are specified using the following two-letter combinations: Mo, Tu, We, Th, Fr, Sa, Su.- Times are specified using 24:00 time. For example, 3pm is specified as 15:00. - Here is an example: Tuesdays and Thursdays 4-8pm. - If a business is open 7 days a week, then it can be specified as Monday through Sunday, all day.

priceRange.name: priceRange
priceRange.description: The price range of the business, for example $$$.
